reviewText: I wouldn't take off my list any motion picture that that madcap was involved in. Some are better by a bit than others but none are to be overlooked. Hay was a master of comic logorrhea, delivered in deadpan earnest and inconscient obduracy. I never tire of his blustering buffoonery. Now, in life, I have just insulted a man; however, in the context of art, I have lauded him.
